general_advisory: Yellow stem borer management in paddy crop. Blast disease management. Tobacco caterpillar management in black gram & green gram. Early shoot borer management in sugarcane. Brinjal shoot and fruit borer management. Whitefly infestation prevention in okra. Onion harvesting and storage advice. Mango hopper control.

advisory: Panicle initiation, Panicle emergence, flowering, and milking stages are critical. Avoid water deficit during these stages.
